name: Electronic Flight
description:
Use arrows to move the bird and collect the orbs at the beat. Press ESC to pause. 

Made for an assigment in my Master's in Viedo Game Design around topics Electric and feathers.

All assets are free:

  • Music: Rock Thing by Creo
  • Bird model 
  • Sound effects: Youtube Audio Library
  • Various free assets packs:  Particles, Glow shaders, Skybox
  • Font
